element.name: T2DPoint
element.short: the 2D Integer-Point- Class.

element.name: T2DPoint.x
element.short: x Koordinate

element.name: T2DPoint.y
element.short: Y-Koordinate

element.name: T2DPoint.init
element.short: Initializes the Class

element.name: T2DPoint.done
element.short: Destructs the class

element.name: T2DPoint.Copy
element.short: Takes and sets the given values

element.name: T2DPoint.Add
element.short: Adds the given values to the Point

element.name: T2DPoint.Negate
element.short: Negates the values of the point

element.name: T2DPoint.Subtr
element.short: Subtracts the given value from the point.

element.name: T2DPoint.XMult
element.short: Makes a Cross-Multiplication of the two points.

element.name: T2DPoint.VMult
element.short: Performs a vector multiplication (result is integer)

element.name: T2DPoint.SMult
element.short: Performs a Scalarmultiplication (the scalar can be rational, with the scalar and a divisor)

element.name: T2DPoint.Equals
element.short: If the given object is equal to the point

element.name: T2DPoint.IsIn
element.short: is true when the point is in the given rect

element.name: T2DPoint.Len
element.short: The length of the path from Zero to the point

element.name: T2DPoint.GLen
element.short: Length of the path to the point only going in right angles

element.name: T2DPoint.MLen
element.short: Gives the absolute maximum of the two koordinates

element.name: T2DPoint.AsPoint
element.short: gives the point as TPoint

element.name: getdir
element.short: get the direction (point) of a radius and a direction.

element.name: getDirNo
element.short: Gives the direction of a point (the radius is given with the length)

element.name: getInvDir
element.short: Gives the oposing direction of a given direction

element.name: Point2D
element.short: Creates a new 2D-Point
